org.gradle.platform.base.binary

Class BaseBinarySpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractBuildableModelElement
      • org.gradle.platform.base.binary.BaseBinarySpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable, BuildableModelElement, Named, BinarySpec, org.gradle.platform.base.internal.BinarySpecInternal

    @Incubating
public abstract class BaseBinarySpec
extends org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractBuildableModelElement
implements org.gradle.platform.base.internal.BinarySpecInternal
    Base class for custom binary implementations. A custom implementation of BinarySpec must extend this type. TODO at the moment leaking BinarySpecInternal here to generate lifecycleTask in LanguageBasePlugin$createLifecycleTaskForBinary#createLifecycleTaskForBinary rule
